Summary: i was in the 6 th. grade and was chased by very tall apes and got to ride in a square candy apple red car that floated down the hill.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the sisth grade in 1958-9. i had a dream. our school had been condemed during the summer and we were placed into alternate buildings for school that year, a local church and the via hall, across from new post office( now library). the via hall was converted into the 6th, and 7th grades and the principals office. i awoke to find myself and all my classmates back at school, all the inside lights and outside lights were on. the whole school ward was litup, there were very tall ape like beings all around. they chased us to keep us from running away. but we could not get out of the lighted area outside, as hard as we tried. some people hid inside the school rooms, some hid inside the bathrooms, but eventually we all calmed down. i remember riding in a bright candy apple red car. it was square and was a two seater, so we had to take turns riding in it. it seemed to just float above the ground and once we were insise the car we floated down the hill, in a zig-zag motion. i never mentioned it to any of my classmates. i thought it was just a dream. i remember being terrified at first, then later i had fun riding in the car down the hill i do not remember going back up the hill. i awoke the next morning thinking it was just a dream. i also remember having dreams of a beautiful white horse with long white tail and main that was in a carrol of reeds. when i tried to help the horse or set it free it would chase me. as hard and as fast as i tried to out run the horse it would overtake me and i would wake up. scared to death , swetting proufesly, and after what seemed like hours go back to sleep. i do remember being very tired the next day.
